Description:
Experience in general service requiring basic occupational knowledge and skills in audiology, hearing aid service and medical facility.
Knowledge of theory and application of audiological equipment.
Ability to acticulate description of hearing and conditions.
Ability to articulate the role of Audiology specialist to the patients. 
Ability to communicate well with patients despite potential hearing issues.
Must be calm and reassuring exuding confidence and professionalism.EducationAUDIOLOGYJob Details
